entry.title: FROST ADVISORY IN EFFECT, Kawartha Lakes (Lindsay)
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:06 PM EDT Sunday 15 May 2016

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mostly Cloudy, 5.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Peterborough Municipal Airport 4:00 PM EDT Sunday 15 May 2016
Condition: Mostly Cloudy
Temperature: 5.8°C
Pressure: 101.1 kPa
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 49 %
Dewpoint: -4.0°C
Wind: NW 39 km/h gust 54 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of rain showers or flurries. Low zero with patchy frost. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of rain showers or flurries early this evening. Clearing near midnight. Wind west 40 km/h gusting to 60 diminishing to 20 this evening then becoming light after midnight. Low zero with patchy frost. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Sunday 15 May 2016

entry.title: Monday: Mainly sunny. High 13.
entry.summary: Sunny. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud in the afternoon. Wind becoming west 20 km/h late in the morning. High 13. UV index 6 or high. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Sunday 15 May 2016

entry.title: Monday night: A few clouds. Low zero with patchy frost.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming clear late in the evening. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light in the evening. Low zero with patchy frost. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Sunday 15 May 2016
